info.title: Giphy API
info.description: Giphy is an animated GIF search engine. The Giphy API is open to the public. We have instituted a simple, single public beta key system to let anyone try it out. The API key is required for all endpoints.

get.description: A multiget version of the get GIF by ID endpoint. In this case the IDs are feqkVgjJpYtjy and 7rzbxdu0ZEXLy. Note the additional user metadata attached to the document that describes the second GIF in the response, 7rzbxdu0ZEXLy.nn http://api.giphy.com/v1/gifs?api_key=dc6zaTOxFJmzC&ids=feqkVgjJpYtjy,7rzbxdu0ZEXLynnExample

Returns a random GIF, limited by tag. Excluding the tag parameter will return a random GIF from the Giphy catalog.nn http://api.giphy.com/v1/gifs/random?api_key=dc6zaTOxFJmzC&tag=american+psychonnExample

parameters.name: max_timestamp
parameters.description: Return media before this UNIX timestamp.

parameters.name: min_timestamp
parameters.description: Return media after this UNIX timestamp.

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: The ID of a user to get recent media of, or **self** to retrieve media of authenticated user.

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: The ID of a user, or **self** to retrieve information about authenticated user.

get.description: Search all Giphy GIFs for a word or phrase. Punctuation will be stripped and ignored. Use a plus or url encode for phrases. nnExamples:nnpaul+ruddnnryan+goslingnnamerican+psychonnfunny+cat

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Type of action to apply for relationship with the user.

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: The ID of the target user.

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: The ID of a user to get information about.

get.description: The translate API draws on search, but uses the Giphy special sauce to handle translating from one vocabulary to another. In this case, words and phrases to GIFs. Example implementations of translate can be found in the Giphy Slack, Hipchat, Wire, or Dasher integrations. Use a plus or url encode for phrases.nn http://api.giphy.com/v1/gifs/translate?s=superman&api_key=dc6zaTOxFJmzCnnExample

Fetch GIFs currently trending online. Hand curated by the Giphy editorial team. The data returned mirrors the GIFs showcased on the [Giphy homepage](http://giphy.com). Returns 25 results by default.nn http://api.giphy.com/v1/gifs/trending?api_key=dc6zaTOxFJmzCnnExample trending GIFs query.nExample trending GIFs limited to 5 results.
Returns meta data about a GIF, by GIF id. In the below example, the GIF ID is feqkVgjJpYtjynn http://api.giphy.com/v1/gifs/feqkVgjJpYtjy?api_key=dc6zaTOxFJmzCnnExample
